reviewText:
Marble Hornets is an amazing series with great characters, plot, and mystery. But the creators have it all for free on YouTube!
But if you want to support them, buy it from their THAC store, its much cheaper and the money goes to them.

This series is great, but this price is ridiculous. If you want this DVD, go support the creators and buy it at store.thac.tv (updated link). You can even get it signed by the creators for just a few extra bucks, and it's still less than $20.

I rate the series five stars. However you are much better off buying the DVDs off of the creators.
marblehornetsdvd.com

Man!!!! Never have I not completely understood a movie and loved it soooo much!! You can watch it on you tube. I guess its based on the Slenderman,however I cant remember the teens involved mentioning it. Its a long,long series ,but its absoletely riveting. I watched all the episodes in 2 days and it was addictive. Well made found footage and just very well done. Each episode has you watching the next one..then the next one...etc,etc. The Slenderman is frequently seen..again..I just never remember the main characters mentioning him. I will need to watch episode one again. A great watch for found footage fans. I believe these guys made this for Youtube and they kicked butt!!!
my son loves marble hornets and I got him this for his birthday. we watched it as a family right after it arrived

Don't buy this item! The sellers are buying these from the official site and re-selling them at a hugely inflated price! Marble Hornets is a brilliant series and I have bought the DVDs myself. I would not hesitate to recommend you do the same, but PLEASE do yourself a favour and buy from the official site! (marblehornetsdvd.com)

First off: This series is amazing! The best series to ever come from the internet!

I voted this 1star so people would see this. The people selling this DVD on Amazon are not the creators and are selling it for 6x the amount that you can buy it from the creators. For the same product, but straight from the creators and 1/6th of the price go to marblehornetsdvd.com

Marble Hornets is an amazing web series and probably the MOST successful webs series about Slenderman. However for the price of this DVD you're better off buying it straight from the creators of Marble Hornets.
Marble Hornets is an amazing show, but it is ridiculously overpriced here.  Go to marblehornetsdvd.com to buy it directly from the creators for the price that they intended.
